code: import{useEffect,useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{useFormik}from"formik";import{useNavigate,useParams,Link}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export function DeleteVideo(){const[videos,setVideos]=useState([{VideoId:0,Title:'',URL:'',Likes:0,Comments:'',Category_Id:0}]);let navigate=useNavigate();let params=useParams();useEffect(()=>{axios.get(`http://127.0.0.1:3334/Videosid/${params.id}`).then(response=>{setVideos(response.data);});},[]);function handleDeleteClick(){axios.delete(`http://127.0.0.1:3334/deletevideos/${params.id}`);alert('Video Deleted');navigate('/admindashboard');}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Delete Video"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:videos[0].Title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("iframe",{src:videos[0].URL,width:"400",height:"300"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mt-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleDeleteClick,className:"btn btn-danger me-2",children:"Delete"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/admindashboard",className:"btn btn-warning",children:"Cancel"})]})]});}
